kulami.connectivity

Class MessageSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • kulami.connectivity.MessageSender

  • public class MessageSender
extends java.lang.Object
    The MessageSender class contains methods that correspond to messages that the Kulami server expects from clients.

    This class formats messages correctly and forwards them to a ServerProxy for transmission to the server.

    Author:
    gordon
